title: sIsa gang
sahitya:
sIsa gang anga aradhang gaurI sang paradhara kE var turanga tApa bhanga jag kE


caraNam 1    sadA nanha bharA rang bhUSaN kE bhaya bhujangaTe caraNn mrgamatangsang kIjO pag kE
    caraNam 2    hatAnangkrpApAng dhArE hAth bich kurang bAs kInhO hrdaykamal padmanAbh prabhu kE
